TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_ami_Taluk, title = Taluk, year = 2025, month = May, day = 5, note = {In Wikipedia [Amis]}, url = {https://ami.wikipedia.org/wiki/Taluk} }

S.FORM: Taluk Itiniay i Zhuoxi Cen no Hualien ko Taluk a niyaro', 169 ko sa'osi no parod no loma', 629 ko sa'osi no tamdaw. 93% ko ka'aloman no Yincomin, polong han i, 583 ko tamdaw; o roma sato i, 7% ko ka'aloman no roma a finacadan, polong han i, 46 ko tamdaw. O pa-sin-to no ka'aloman no tamdaw no kasafinacadan i, ko Bunun83%, Amis2%, Tayal1%, Truku2%, roma4%. Ira ko picodadan i niyaro'. Ira ko imeng i niyaro'.

Talok Itiniay i Zhooxi Cen no Hoalien ko Talok a niyaro', 169 ko sa'osi no parod no loma', 629 ko sa'osi no tamdaw. 93% ko ka'aloman no Yincomin, polong han i, 583 ko tamdaw; o roma sato i, 7% ko ka'aloman no roma a finacadan, polong han i, 46 ko tamdaw. O pa-sin-to no ka'aloman no tamdaw no kasafinacadan i, ko Bonon83%, Amis2%, Tayal1%, Troko2%, roma4%. Ira ko picodadan i niyaro'. Ira ko imeng i niyaro'.
